entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then light snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing rain in the evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
